description:
Complete rewrite of the drum part. Structure of the song was not modified. So there might be some slight variations missing inside repeated sections.
Normally all other instruments were not modified.
Too bad gpx format is not supported : the gp5 export forgets about all stem orientation made in order to have a better readable drum part.
title: Simple Man
